content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) is connected to a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- The offshore pump is connected to a pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5)
### Transport system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
### Errors when using inserter entities
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items before using them
### Errors when using steam engine entities
- Ensure that steam engine entities are connected to a power network before using them
### Errors when using offshore pump entities
- Ensure that offshore pump entities are connected to a pipe network before using them
### Errors when using electricity group entities
- Ensure that electricity group entities are plugged into an electric network before using them

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
